message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and quality that we believe will greatly benefit you. We're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $125. We're confident that this investment will pay off in terms of convenience, efficiency, and satisfaction. Looking forward to your response.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the features you mentioned, $125 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. We would like to make a counteroffer of $95 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of our product while remaining within your budget. Please let us know if this works for you.
